parameter.value: *** XML FILE NAME OF THE CALLED FUNCTION: fn_FordCredit.xml ***

parameter.name: Clear the text box and enter

parameter.value: 'FordCreditUserName' field inputted with the user given value

parameter.name: Clear the text box and enter

parameter.value: 'FordCreditPassword' field inputted with the user given value

step.name: Dummy State - After entering username and password

parameter.value: 'Checkbox' is available/enabled and clicked on the FordCreditLogin page

step.name: Dummy State - After clicking FordpassPin checkbox

parameter.value: 'FordPassPIN' checkbox is not available/enabled on the FordCreditLogin page
'Login' button is available/enabled and clicked on the FordCredit Login page

step.name: Dummy State - After clicking login button

parameter.value: 'Login' button is not available/enabled on the FordCredit Login page
